document.title: Hot Topic: Failure to Provide Proof of Automobile Insurance a Municipal Ordinance Violation
document.abstract: Tennessee Code Annotated requires drivers of vehicles charged with various state and local traffic violations, or involved in traffic accidents, to produce proof of automobile insurance and a city may make the violation of that statute a municipal ordinance violation.
